template.name: cron_per_role_template
template.summary: The per role template for the cron module.

desc.p: This template creates a derived domains which are used for running programs on behalf of the user, from cron. A type for the user crontab is also created.
This template is invoked automatically for each user, and generally does not need to be invoked directly by policy writers.

param.name: userdomain_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).

param.name: user_domain
param.summary: The type of the user domain.

param.name: user_role
param.summary: The role associated with the user domain.

template.name: cron_admin_template
template.summary: The administrative functions template for the cron module.

desc.p: This template creates rules for administrating the cron service, allowing the specified user to manage other user crontabs.

param.name: userdomain_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).
